p:
H 2S is a signal in the plant defense response.
9 Proteomics data in this study showed that some proteins involved in the H 2S biosynthesis coordinately accumulated after NaCl treatment ( Table S1), indicating the potential role of the H 2S signal in S. alterniflora tolerance to salt stress. Thus, the endogenous H 2S content in the leaves of S. alterniflora was measured and found that NaCl gradually induced the generation of H 2S, peaking after 5 days of NaCl treatment. NaCl treatment also induced H 2S generation in the leaves of C. malaccensis, but to a lesser extent than in S. alterniflora ( Figure 4 ). Consistent with H 2S generation, the enzyme activity of l-CD was also higher in the leaves of S. alterniflora than in those of C. malaccensis after NaCl treatment ( Figure 4 ). These data show that NaCl treatment induced higher levels of H 2S generation in S. alterniflora than in C. malaccensis, and indicate the potential role of H 2S in enhancing S. alterniflora tolerance to salt stress.
